verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G1588>elect,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G2150>godliness;<s%>

In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> that cannot <S%G893>lie,<s%> <S%G1861>promised<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the world <S%G166>began;<s%> <S%G5550><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> hath in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2782>preaching,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G4100>committed<s%> unto <S%G1473>me<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior;<s%>

To <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> mine <S%G1103>own<s%> <S%G5043>son<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior.<s%>

For this <S%G5484>cause<s%> <S%G5127><s%> <S%G2641>left<s%> I <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2914>Crete,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest set in <S%G1930>order<s%> the things that are <S%G3007>wanting,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2525>ordain<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in every <S%G2596>city,<s%> <S%G4172><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> had <S%G1299>appointed<s%> thee: <S%G4671><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G410>blameless,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3623>steward<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G829>self-willed,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> soon <S%G3711>angry,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> given to <S%G3943>wine,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4131>striker,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> given to filthy <S%G146>lucre;<s%>
But <S%G235><s%> a lover of <S%G5382>hospitality,<s%> a lover of good <S%G5358>men,<s%> <S%G4998>sober,<s%> <S%G1342>just,<s%> <S%G3741>holy,<s%> <S%G1468>temperate;<s%>

Holding <S%G472>fast<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> as he hath been <S%G2596>taught,<s%> <S%G1322><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1651>convince<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G483>gainsayers.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2532>unruly<s%> <S%G506><s%> and vain <S%G3151>talkers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5423>deceivers,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the circumcision: <S%G4061><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> mouths must be <S%G1993>stopped,<s%> <S%G1163><s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G396>subvert<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3624>houses,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> for filthy lucre's <S%G5484>sake.<s%> <S%G150><s%> <S%G2771><s%>

One <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>themselves,<s%> even a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2398>own,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G2912>Cretians<s%> are <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G5583>liars,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2342>beasts,<s%> <S%G692>slow<s%> <S%G1064>bellies.<s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> giving <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G2451>Jewish<s%> <S%G3454>fables,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> that turn <S%G654>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

Unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2513>pure<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3303>are<s%> <S%G2513>pure:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> unto <S%G3588>them<s%> that are <S%G3392>defiled<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2513>pure;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> is <S%G3392>defiled.<s%>

They <S%G3670>profess<s%> that they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> in <S%G2041>works<s%> they <S%G720>deny<s%> him, <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G947>abominable,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G545>disobedient,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G96>reprobate.<s%>
